verbs.description: [V: According] to Gallup polling , Trump enjoys greater Republican loyalty than any president of the post - World War II era other than George W. Bush after 9/11 .
[ARGM-ADV: According to Gallup polling] , [ARG0: Trump] [V: enjoys] [ARG1: greater Republican loyalty than any president of the post - World War II era other than George W. Bush after 9/11] .
